Material used.Description: Primary cultures of rat cortical cells were prepared from neonatal Wistar rats.

Readout description.Result Description: Overexpression of mutant A53T ␣-synuclein led to an increase in the number of EGFP-LC3 positive autophagosomes and enhanced LC3-I cleavage into LC3-II.

Biological replicates.Description: At least 15 cell bodies or 18 axonal fragments were analyzed per group.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA, followed by a Newman-Keuls posthoc test or Kruskal-Wallis test, followed by a Dunn's test.

Material used.Description: Primary cultures of rat cortical cells were prepared from neonatal Wistar rats.

Readout description.Result Description: Overexpression of mutant A53T ␣-synuclein led to an increase in the number of mitochondria that colocalized with autophagosomes.

Biological replicates.Description: At least 15 cell bodies or 18 axonal fragments were analyzed per group.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA, followed by a Newman-Keuls posthoc test or Kruskal-Wallis test, followed by a Dunn's test.
